          <title>
            <string language="en">Types of Geological Faults</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen der geologischen Störungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de défauts géologiques</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Animation which demonstrates the process which forms the various types of geological faults.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animación que demuestra el proceso que forma los
varios tipos de incidentes geológicos.</string>
